Wow. Another year older. At what age are we allowed to depart the ever-spinning clock and rest? Yvesie you deserve the best day ever! May all your Type IDs be easy, your drums stay tuned, your love stay strong, and your children stay healthy! All the best!

Thank you so very much everyone for your wishes. These birthday threads are the best. :^)

Lari -- I'll be damned, I haven't got a clue. Then again, the chocolate overdose (see below) probably fried a couple of synapses.

Chris -- too funny! :^D :^D :^D

Tiff -- Sabine bought a nice chocolate cake for desert. She also had a special treat for me later tonight. Let's say the belly dance courses she took last year paid off. ;^)

Dav -- I will, but in a week or two. We've had enough partying the past weeks with Christmas and New Year and all that stuff. ;^)
